courses.name: MERN
courses.description: MERN stands for MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js — a popular JavaScript-based full-stack development stack for building dynamic web applications.

courses.name: MEAN
courses.description: MEAN stands for MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js — a full-stack JavaScript framework used to build dynamic web applications using a single language.

courses.name: Python Full Stack
courses.description: Python Full Stack development involves Python-based frameworks like Django or Flask on the backend, with frontend technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

courses.name: Java Full Stack
courses.description: Java Full Stack development includes Spring Boot, Hibernate for the backend and frontend technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React/Angular.

courses.name: Data Analysis with Python
courses.description: Learn to analyze, clean, and visualize data using Python libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib to derive meaningful insights.

courses.name: Machine Learning
courses.description: An introduction to machine learning algorithms like Linear Regression, KNN, Decision Trees, and more using Python and Scikit-learn.

courses.name: SQL for Data Science
courses.description: Master SQL to extract, manipulate, and analyze data from relational databases — a critical skill in any data science role.

courses.name: Python for Data Science
courses.description: Learn Python fundamentals tailored for data science including variables, loops, functions, and working with data using libraries like Pandas and NumPy.

courses.name: Android App Development (Java)
courses.description: Learn to build native Android applications using Java and Android Studio, covering layouts, activities, and APIs.

courses.name: Android App Development (Kotlin)
courses.description: Master Android development with Kotlin, Google's preferred language for building Android apps.

courses.name: iOS App Development (Swift)
courses.description: Learn iOS development using Swift and Xcode to build sleek and performant apps for iPhones and iPads.

courses.name: React Native App Development
courses.description: Build mobile apps using React Native, covering components, navigation, and integrate native modules.

courses.name: AWS Cloud Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of Amazon Web Services (AWS), including EC2, S3 to build scalable cloud applications.

courses.name: Microsoft Azure Essentials
courses.description: Understand core Azure services like Virtual Machines and App Services for cloud-based deployment.

courses.name: Google Cloud Platform Basics
courses.description: Explore GCP services such as Compute Engine and Cloud Storage for cloud computing and data analytics.

courses.name: Docker & Kubernetes
courses.description: Learn containerization with Docker and orchestration with Kubernetes for building scalable DevOps pipelines.

courses.name: Ethical Hacking Basics
courses.description: Get introduced to ethical hacking concepts, penetration testing, and tools like Metasploit, Nmap, and Burp Suite.

courses.name: Network Security Essentials
courses.description: Learn how to secure networks using firewalls, IDS/IPS systems, VPNs, and best practices for network protection.

courses.name: Web Application Security
courses.description: Understand OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities and how to secure web applications against common cyber threats.

courses.name: SOC & SIEM Tools
courses.description: Explore the functioning of Security Operations Centers (SOC) and hands-on training with SIEM tools like Splunk.

courses.name: Manual Testing
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of software testing, including test case design, bug tracking, and SDLC/STLC processes.

courses.name: Automation Testing with Selenium
courses.description: Master Selenium WebDriver to automate web application testing with Java and TestNG frameworks.

courses.name: API Testing
courses.description: Understand how to test RESTful APIs using tools like Postman and automate with RestAssured in Java.

courses.name: Performance Testing with JMeter
courses.description: Learn how to evaluate application performance and scalability using Apache JMeter for load testing.

courses.name: Ethereum & Solidity
courses.description: Learn Ethereum fundamentals and how to write smart contracts using Solidity on the Ethereum blockchain.

courses.name: Smart Contracts
courses.description: Understand the design, development, and deployment of smart contracts for decentralized applications.

courses.name: Web3.js
courses.description: Use Web3.js to interact with Ethereum blockchain from web interfaces and connect frontend with smart contracts.

courses.name: NFT & dApp Development
courses.description: Build and deploy NFTs and decentralized applications using Solidity, IPFS, and blockchain development tools.

courses.name: Unity (C#)
courses.description: Learn to build 2D and 3D games using Unity engine and C#, covering game physics, animations, and scripting.

courses.name: Unreal Engine (C++)
courses.description: Master Unreal Engine with C++ to develop high-performance games with realistic graphics and physics.

courses.name: 2D/3D Game Design
courses.description: Understand game design principles, level design, storytelling, and character development for 2D/3D games.

courses.name: Mobile Game Development
courses.description: Build engaging mobile games for Android and iOS using tools like Unity and Godot, with optimization tips.

courses.name: ETL Pipelines
courses.description: Learn to design and implement ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) pipelines to move and transform data efficiently.

courses.name: Apache Airflow
courses.description: Master workflow orchestration with Apache Airflow to schedule, monitor, and manage data pipelines.

courses.name: Spark & Kafka
courses.description: Work with Apache Spark for big data processing and Kafka for real-time streaming and data ingestion.

courses.name: Data Warehousing
courses.description: Understand how to design and query modern data warehouses using tools like Amazon Redshift.

courses.name: SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
courses.description: Learn techniques to improve website rankings on search engines and drive organic traffic.

courses.name: Social Media Marketing
courses.description: Create effective campaigns on platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn to engage audiences.

courses.name: Google Ads (PPC)
courses.description: Master pay-per-click advertising with Google Ads, including keyword research and ad targeting.

courses.name: Email Marketing & Automation
courses.description: Design, send, and optimize email campaigns using tools like Mailchimp and marketing automation platforms.
